description:
The daughter of the president of another subsidiary of the Tokusa group has gone missing, so Yoshino must be accompanied around the clock by Kirishima for her safety.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Je veux te montrer ma sincérité et que tu m`aimes un peu
Let Me Express My Sincerity, and Maybe Earn Your Affection in the Process
Seii o Misetai. Awayokuba Sukoshi Suki ni Natte Hoshii
誠意を見せたい. あわよくば少し好きになってほしい
